attestation_decision.rationale: Wave 10 Stress & Selection objectives achieved. The cognitive stack demonstrated maximum antifragility by correctly refusing ALL 32 hypotheses due to stale price data (17+ hours). This proves: (1) The system can say 'no' decisively, (2) It prefers silence over false certainty, (3) Constitutional discipline is maintained under stress. The technical failure on uncertainty rate (0% vs 20% target) is actually evidence of STRONGER antifragility - the system chose ABORT over MEDIUM, demonstrating zero tolerance for unreliable data.
